commandList.docker_start: source demo.env && sudo docker container rm conforma_demo_${port} -f ; sudo -E docker run -dti -p $port:3000 -e WEB_HOST=https://${subdomain}.conforma.nz -e SMTP_PASSWORD=${SMTP_PASSWORD} -e DEMO_PW=${demo_password_hash} -e DEMO_EMAIL=${demo_email} --name conforma_demo_${port} msupplyfoundation/conforma:$TAG
